verses.verse: For this <WG5127> cause <WG5484> I Paul, <WG3972> the prisoner <WG1198> of Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> for you Gentiles, <WG1484>
If <WG1489> you have heard <WG191> of the dispensation <WG3622> of the grace <WG5485> of God <WG2316> which <WG3588> is given <WG1325> me to you-ward: <WG1519>
How that by revelation <WG602> he made <WG1107> known <WG1107> to me the mystery; <WG3466> (as I wrote <WG4270> before <WG4270> in few <WG3641> words,
Whereby <WG4314> <WG3739> when you read, <WG314> you may <WG1410> understand <WG3539> my knowledge <WG4907> in the mystery <WG3466> of Christ) <WG5547>

Which <WG3739> in other <WG2087> ages <WG1074> was not made <WG1107> known <WG1107> to the sons <WG5207> of men, <WG444> as it is now <WG3568> revealed <WG601> to his holy <WG40> apostles <WG652> and prophets <WG4396> by the Spirit; <WG4151>
That the Gentiles <WG1484> should be fellow heirs, <WG4789> and of the same <WG4954> body, <WG4954> and partakers <WG4830> of his promise <WG1860> in Christ <WG5547> by the gospel: <WG2098>

Whereof <WG3739> I was made <WG1096> a minister, <WG1249> according <WG2596> to the gift <WG1431> of the grace <WG5485> of God <WG2316> given <WG1325> to me by the effectual <WG1753> working <WG1753> of his power. <WG1411>

To me, who am less <WG1647> than the least <WG1647> of all <WG3956> saints, <WG40> is this <WG3778> grace <WG5485> given, <WG1325> that I should preach <WG2097> among <WG1722> the Gentiles <WG1484> the unsearchable <WG421> riches <WG4149> of Christ; <WG5547>

And to make <WG5461> all <WG3956> men see <WG5461> what <WG5101> is the fellowship <WG2842> of the mystery, <WG3466> which <WG3588> from the beginning of the world <WG165> has been hid <WG614> in God, <WG2316> who <WG3588> created <WG2936> all <WG3956> things by Jesus <WG2424> Christ: <WG5547>

To the intent <WG2443> that now <WG3568> to the principalities <WG746> and powers <WG1849> in heavenly <WG2032> places might be known <WG1107> by the church <WG1577> the manifold <WG4182> wisdom <WG4678> of God, <WG2316>
According <WG2596> to the eternal <WG165> purpose <WG4286> which <WG3739> he purposed <WG4160> in Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424> our Lord: <WG2962>
In whom <WG3739> we have <WG2192> boldness <WG3954> and access <WG4318> with confidence <WG4006> by the faith <WG4102> of him.
Why <WG1352> I desire <WG154> that you faint <WG1573> not at <WG1722> my tribulations <WG2347> for you, which <WG3748> is your glory. <WG1391>
For this <WG5127> cause <WG5484> I bow <WG2578> my knees <WG1119> to the Father <WG3962> of our Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ, <WG5547>
Of whom <WG3739> the whole <WG3956> family <WG3965> in heaven <WG3772> and earth <WG1093> is named, <WG3687>

That he would grant <WG1325> you, according <WG2596> to the riches <WG4149> of his glory, <WG1391> to be strengthened <WG2901> with might <WG1411> by his Spirit <WG4151> in the inner <WG2080> man; <WG444>
That Christ <WG5547> may dwell <WG2730> in your <WG5216> hearts <WG2588> by faith; <WG4102> that you, being rooted <WG4492> and grounded <WG2311> in love, <WG26>
May be able <WG1840> to comprehend <WG2638> with all <WG3956> saints <WG40> what <WG5101> is the breadth, <WG4114> and length, <WG3372> and depth, <WG899> and height; <WG5311>
And to know <WG1097> the love <WG26> of Christ, <WG5547> which passes <WG5235> knowledge, <WG1108> that you might be filled <WG4137> with all <WG3956> the fullness <WG4138> of God. <WG2316>

Now <WG1161> to him that is able <WG1410> to do <WG4160> exceeding <WG5228> abundantly <WG1537> <WG4053> above <WG5228> all <WG3956> that we ask <WG154> or <WG2228> think, <WG3539> according <WG2596> to the power <WG1411> that works <WG1754> in us,
To him be glory <WG1391> in the church <WG1577> by Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424> throughout <WG1519> all <WG3956> ages, <WG1074> world <WG165> without end. <WG165> <WG3588> Amen. <WG281>
